programlisting: # Prints the password policy for the account. def print_account_password_policy policy = @iam_resource.account_password_policy policy.load puts("The account password policy is:") puts(policy.data.to_h) rescue Aws::Errors::ServiceError => e if e.code == "NoSuchEntity" puts("The account does not have a password policy.") else puts("Couldn't print the account password policy. Here's why:") puts("\t#{e.code}: #{e.message}") raise end end
